Desc.eng: Oh, great! There is a creature we called up from the Inkwell. He’s called the Pied Piper and he was supposed to lure away these monsters with the sound of his flute.
Please don’t tell me that you fell for this old trick.
We did, my lady. We did! And he lured away our children instead of the monsters! He is still here, though, but we can’t leave this place.
I'm sorry, but I can't clean up your mess right now.
